alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 25 at 11:40AM MDT until March 25 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. Total accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with localized areas of 2 to 4 inches beneath heavier snow bands. Northwest winds gusting to 45 MPH this afternoon. * WHERE...East central Wyoming into southwest Nebraska Panhandle. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County
